titulo.descripcion: I am a developer with a passion for programming, driven by curiosity and continuous learning. I enjoy creating elegant and efficient solutions to complex problems.

exp2.puesto: Electrical Designer and Draftsman | Software development
exp2.experiencia: I joined a New Zealand engineering company where I worked as an electrical drawing designer, developing in-house design standards and programming work. I developed Python scripts to automate tasks. I worked on the development of a web application for GPS tracking with IOT devices, involving both backend and frontend design. Constantly improving and working to bring the best quality and reliability to customers.

exp1.experiencia: I have worked for a number of New Zealand companies on high/medium/low power electrical design for water treatment plants. Working remotely in coordination with various teams and using Autocad electrical design software to meet IEC design standards.

proyecto1.descripcion: Soy un desarrollador apasionado por la programación, impulsado por la curiosidad y el aprendizaje continuo. Disfruto creando soluciones elegantes y eficientes a problemas complejos.
